title: Mobile Portfolio
description: Mobile Portfolio for Ezekiel Ekunola, which contains Projects built, Articles written by him
contribution: Contributed in designing and building out the mobile application.

title: DotPay
description: Dotpay is a web application that allows you create business account, generate payment links, and receive payments from customers using those generated links.
contribution: Contributed in designing/implementing frontend design of the application.

title: Trackdrills
description: Trackdrills is an application that gives you access to over 500 workouts and exercises to choose from to suit your fitness goals. It is a health-focused app that also gives you the ability to create your own customized workout plans and track your progress.
contribution: Contributed in supervising and overseeing project execution, I also worked on building out interfaces of the frontend of Trackdrills application.

title: Use My Tech Stuff
description: Use My Tech Stuff aims to provide a safe, guaranteed, and efficient way to effortlessly share professional tech equipment.
contribution: Built the frontend of the project using React, Redux, Styled-Components, and Material Design Bootstrap.

title: Anonymous Team Feedback
description: A web application that helps you get honest feedback from your co-workers
contribution: Contributed in developing both frontend, backend and design of Anonymous Team Feedback using React, GraphQL, Apollo, Styled-Components Material Design Bootstrap, Node, Postgres and Jest

title: Store Manager
description: A web application that helps store owners manage sales and product inventory records. Store owners/managers can create store attendant accounts who would be in charge of selling of items in the store.
contribution: Developed both the frontend and backend of the Store Manager using React, Redux, CSS, and Node, Express and Postgres, Mocha and Chai.

title: Mount Doom
description: Mount Doom is a Multi-User Dimension web application game that has chat functionality.
contribution: Contributed in developing the frontend and design of the Multi-User Dimension(MUD) Game using React, Styled-Component, React-Vis and Pusher

title: School In The Cloud
description: School in the Cloud is a platform that trains senior volunteers to teach students in a group or individual setting. This helps kids in communities with high student to teacher ratios. It also provides retired volunteers a sense of purpose and meaning in their day to day life when they find themselves with more free time. The platform also connects volunteers with the students.
contribution: Contributed to the design and implementation of School in the cloud using Html, CSS and Javascript.

title: Marvel Comics
description: Progressive Web Application that displays information about Marvel Comics and Characters.
contribution: Applied the knowledge of React, Styled-Components, and Material-Design to the design and implementation of Marvel Comics.

title: Movie Listing
description: Web Application that lists comprehensive details about Movies and TV-Series.
contribution: Contributed in the desgin and implementation of Movie Listing using React and Material Design Bootstrap.

title: AngularRank
description: Web Application that ranks repositories contributors of the Angular organization on Github.
contribution: Contributed in the desgin and implementation of Angularank using Vue, Vuetify and Github API.

title: Movie Info
description: Web Application that lists comprehensive details about Movies and TV-Series.
contribution: Contributed in the desgin and implementation of Movie Listing application using Vue, Vuetify and TMDB API.

title: Vue Calendar
description: Web Application that shows events on calendar, and schedule events as well.

title: Weather App
description: A web application for telling weather of a location.

title: Headline News
description: A progressive web application that allows you view latest and currrent news accross the world.

title: Laravel Blog
description: A web application for writing blogs and articles.

title: Face Detection
description: A web application for detecting celebrity faces using photos.

title: Robofriends
description: A web application for listing friends details using robots.
